charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1101_010:
While walking in the forest,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard a shout.
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1101_020:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] followed the sound and came across Wally
and Gallade doing some special training.
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_050: Could you tell what I was thinking?
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_070:
If we keep this up, I’m sure we’ll get a lot
stro— Huh?
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_090:
Sorry! I didn’t notice you were there!
I was focused on Gallade...
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_140: Sometimes Gallade and I come here to train.
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_150:
Trainers and Pokémon with many different kinds
of battle styles have come to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_160:
So, I want to see just how far we can go as a
sync pair here!
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_170:
I... I’m definitely... I’m going to get stronger.
Much, much stronger!
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_0301_180: Why do you want to get stronger?
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_0401_190: Why...? That’s a difficult question to answer.
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_0302_200:
Getting stronger is hard,
don’t you think?
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_230:
I want to get stronger so I can grow closer
with Gallade.
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_240:
I used to have no courage... Even going
outside for a walk was difficult.
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_250:
But that changed when I met my partner
Pokémon... When I met Ralts.
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_260: Ralts and I faced so many challenges together.
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_270: I was able to keep positive and move forward...
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_280:
Ralts grew so strong and was eventually able to
evolve all the way into Gallade!
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_290: Our bond has grown as we’ve gotten stronger.
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_300:
That’s why I think getting stronger is related
to growing as a sync pair!
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_0301_310: You two make for a great sync pair!
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_0401_320: Hehe... It’s all thanks to Gallade.
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_0402_340: Hehe... It’s all thanks to Gallade.
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_350: All I do is rely on Gallade...
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_360:
Gallade can sense what his opponent is thinking.
I think that skill helps him understand me, too.
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_380:
I want to keep getting stronger and stronger.
That’s why I’ve got to do lots of training!
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_1201_390:
So... So when I’m strong enough, will you have a
battle with me?
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_0401_410:
I’m definitely...definitely going to have a real
Pokémon battle with you!
charaepi_ch0128_00_mitsuru/2301_0402_430:
I’m definitely...definitely going to have a real
Pokémon battle with you!
